title: Midseason lessons for all 30 NBA teams: Trade dramas, standings surprises dominate the first half
content: What have we learned about every team throughout the first half of 2025-26? Tim Bontemps canvasses the league.

title: Sources: Bills interviewing ex-QB Rivers for coach
content: The list of Bills coaching candidates is growing to include former quarterback Philip Rivers, sources told ESPN.

title: UFC's Smotherman collapses after making weight
content: UFC bantamweight Cameron Smotherman collapsed moments after making weight Friday in a disturbing scene for the sport of mixed martial arts.

title: NBA, college sports adjust due to winter storm
content: At least one NBA game and dozens of college basketball games across a wide swath of the country are rescheduled because of an approaching major winter storm.

title: Ex-Eagles lineman Johnson dies at homeless site
content: Former Eagles defensive lineman Kevin Johnson died from "blunt head trauma and stab wounds" at a homeless encampment, according to the Los Angeles medical examiner.

title: Ex-snowboarder, FBI fugitive Wedding arrested
content: Ryan Wedding, a former Olympic snowboarder who was among the FBI's most-wanted fugitives and faces charges related to drug trafficking and the killing of a federal witnesses, has been arrested, according to authorities.

title: Resale shows eye popping World Cup ticket prices
content: FIFA president Gianni Infantino said that many fans who have applied for tickets for the 2026 World Cup will be looking to sell them for profit on resale sites, thus driving up the cost of ticket prices.

title: Scherzer may wait past Opening Day for right fit
content: Free agent right-hander Max Scherzer is in no hurry to sign for a 19th major league season but also says he is healthy and ready if certain teams call.

title: CFP to remain a 12-team field for next season
content: The College Football Playoff will stick with its "current structure" and remain a 12-team field in 2026, the CFP's management committee announced Friday.

title: üèà Top 25 CFB portal classes: Kiffin delivers
content: These teams nailed their top targets or won a QB battle. Others had to reload at quite a few positions.

title: Two NFL conference title games, two matchup previews: We have predictions, score picks and X factors
content: Drake Maye vs. Jarrett Stidham. Matthew Stafford vs. Sam Darnold. We have picks, stats to know and more for the AFC and NFC title games.

title: Ranking the 100 best college football players from the 2025 season
content: Which players take the top spots? Our college football experts rank the top 100 players from the 2025 season.

title: Predictions for rest of MLB offseason: Where will the best ace available sign? Who will make a major trade?
content: How will the rest of free agency play out? Here's what our experts think could go down between now and spring training.

title: The new Mets are better than the old Mets -- and we can prove it
content: New York will have a new look for 2026. We break down what has changed and whether the team has improved.

title: Men's: Future Pac-12 schools will challenge power conferences
content: The current non-power at-larges are spread across leagues. But next season, many will challenge the high majors under the Pac-12 umbrella.

title: Women's: Big nonconference win boosts Ohio State to a 3-seed
content: Results Sunday and Monday shook up the top 16, and the Buckeyes benefited the most, climbing two seed lines.

title: Ranking the NFL's best offensive, defensive coordinator openings, plus intel on top candidates
content: There are currently more than a dozen offensive and defensive coordinator openings around the NFL. What are the most desirable jobs, and who could land them?

title: Why the Broncos are confident in backup QB Jarrett Stidham: 'We have full faith in Stiddy'
content: The circumstances behind Stidham's AFC title game start haven't been seen since 1972, but the Broncos believe in their backup quarterback.

title: Can Sam Darnold overcome his nemesis -- the L.A. Rams -- to get to Super Bowl?
content: Seahawks quarterback Sam Darnold has struggled with turnovers against the Rams. Will Sunday be different?

title: USWNT star Trinity Rodman's record deal: Why it's a boon for her, but NWSL worries linger
content: Trinity Rodman will stay in the U.S. and play for the NWSL. Even as she rejected offers from England, it exposes the NWSL's problems retaining stars.

title: Premier League Power Rankings: Rating all 20 teams on performances, not results
content: In the debut of ESPN's Premier League Power Rankings, a look at all 20 teams, including why Liverpool, Chelsea and Tottenham are better than the table suggests.

title: Laurens' weekend preview: Can Carrick stop Arsenal? Arbeloa faces another test, more
content: Man United look to upset Arsenal, Real Madrid face a tough test, and there's a race for second in the WSL.

title: NHL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, plus each team's top celebrity fan
content: The Canes move into the top 3, while the Penguins and Mammoth rise too. Which team was the biggest faller?

title: Third time's a charm? The Rams-Seahawks bets that have hit twice and will hit again
content: Eric Moody looks at the prop bets that hit in the previous Rams-Seahawks matchups that are most likely to land a third time.

title: 'She fired everyone': Inside the Buss family's $10B sale of the Lakers
content: The post-Jerry Buss era was defined by resentment, dysfunction and conflict -- and ended with the loss of the most valuable family-owned franchise in the world.

title: Scoring is up, freshmen are elite and more storylines shaping men's hoops
content: The good (Nebraska), not-so-good (Kentucky) and interesting (dominant freshmen) of the 2025-26 season so far.

title: A 788% spike? Why Jarrett Stidham cards are suddenly a hot commodity
content: With Denver turning to Jarrett Stidham in the AFC Championship, collectors are betting big on his moment.

title: Justin Gaethje: The UFC's most exciting MMA experience
content: Justin Gaethje meets Paddy Pimblett on Saturday with a plan to cement his most exciting UFC fighter status.

title: What is Zuffa Boxing? Fighters, format, rules, more details
content: Dana White's Zuffa Boxing makes its debut Friday in Las Vegas. Andreas Hale answers some of the key questions you may have about the new promotion.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Saudi league eyes Salah, Vin√≠cius Jr. plus 50 more
content: The Saudi Pro League has big plans to sign Liverpool's Mohamed Salah and Real Madrid's Vin√≠cius J√∫nior. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Keep, cut or add? What to do with George, Markkanen and six other trending players
content: Helping you decide whether to give up on a few struggling players or believe in those who are ascending.

title: Why is testing in January and why is nobody there? First Barcelona test explained
content: A Formula 1 test in January, in the middle of winter, behind closed doors and with no media or fans in sight? ESPN fills you in on all you need to know ahead of Barcelona testing.

title: IND vs NZ: Surya, Ishan crush New Zealand as India go 2-0 up in T20I series
content: India surged to a commanding 2-0 lead in the T20 series against New Zealand, securing a seven-wicket victory in Raipur. Ishan Kishan's explosive 76 and Suryakumar Yadav's unbeaten 82 powered the chase, while Kuldeep Yadav's two wickets proved crucial in restricting the visitors.  The hosts comfortably overhauled New Zealand's 208-run target.

title: Trump tariffs, falling rupee: Key risks to India's growth story; can the Budget protect it?
content: In the backdrop of Donald Trump's tariff threats, uncertainty over India-US trade deal and rising geopolitical tensions, Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman‚Äôs Union Budget 2026 assumes significance. What are the risks to India‚Äôs robust and resilient growth story, and what can Budget 2026 do to mitigate them? We ask economists:

title: Netflix rejects Paramount‚Äôs offer; says it has nothing else other than Oracle founder Ellison‚Äôs ‚Ä¶
content: Netflix co-CEO Greg Peters dismissed Paramount Skydance's $108 billion bid for Warner Bros. Discovery as unrealistic, citing its heavy reliance on debt. He contrasted it with Netflix's more stable $82.7 billion all-cash offer, which is gaining traction with shareholders.  The potential merger faces significant Hollywood and regulatory scrutiny.

title: Accenture CEO Julie Sweet to CEOs: 'In three years, you should be able to say‚Ä¶'
content: Accenture CEO Julie Sweet stresses that leaders must grasp AI to guide their companies through transformation. She advocates for leader-led training, citing a client whose 300 leaders had to directly use AI tools before progress was made. This hands-on approach, starting with top executives, is crucial for unlocking AI's potential and ensuring widespread adoption across all sectors.

title: Indian seafarers are most abandoned in the world again
content: Indian sailors faced the worst abandonment in 2025. Over 1,100 Indian seafarers were left stranded on ships. This marks a significant increase from previous years. Many were left without pay and unable to return home. The International Transport Workers‚Äô Federation is working to recover wages. This situation highlights serious issues in the maritime industry.

title: The great escape: When Pakistan's Hanif Mohammad batted four days to save Test
content: Hanif Mohammad's monumental 337 against the West Indies in 1958 secured Pakistan's first Test draw.  He batted for 970 minutes, showcasing incredible patience and resilience to save his team from defeat after following on. This innings remains the longest in Test cricket history by time.

title: Selling US bonds, buying gold: How India is decoupling from the dollar
content: RBI is not among the largest holders of US government debt, with its exposure at about a quarter of China‚Äôs nearly $683 billion holdings. Even so, India‚Äôs selling has added fresh momentum to discussions about the place of US sovereign bonds in global investment portfolios.

title: Amazon preparing for another round of layoffs, thousands of jobs under scanner
content: Amazon is planning to cut approximately 14,000 corporate jobs starting next week, marking the second major layoff wave since October and bringing total reductions to 30,000 roles. CEO Andy Jassy clarified the cuts aren't driven by AI or financial concerns but by excessive bureaucracy and organizational layers. The layoffs will affect employees across AWS, retail, Prime Video, and human resources divisions, representing nearly 10% of Amazon's corporate workforce.

title: Markets crash: Investors lost over Rs 16 lakh cr this week; what caused the dip?
content: Stock market crash: Sensex and Nifty have fallen nearly 1% on Friday amid broad-based selling, a record-low rupee and persistent foreign outflows, dragging market sentiment despite supportive global cues.

title: Silver surge: White metal breaches $100 per ounce for first time
content: Silver prices soared to an unprecedented all-time high of $100 an ounce on Friday, driven by investor demand for safe-haven assets amidst US policy uncertainty. The precious metal's surge is also attributed to its industrial applications and tight supply, with gold also trading near record levels.

title: Surya's heartwarming moment after Kishan's dismissal steals the spotlight
content: India faced early pressure chasing New Zealand's 209. Ishan Kishan arrived at number three and played a fearless innings of 76 runs from just 32 balls. He partnered with captain Suryakumar Yadav for a 122-run stand. This partnership shifted the game's momentum. New Zealand had earlier posted 208 for 6. Kuldeep Yadav took two wickets for India.

title: Microsoft to its software engineers: Use both Claude Code and GitHub Copilot, give...
content: Microsoft is now having thousands of its software engineers test Anthropic's Claude Code alongside its own GitHub Copilot. This move signals growing confidence in AI coding tools, with even non-technical staff encouraged to experiment.  Nvidia's CEO also recently urged engineers to embrace AI coding assistants, highlighting a significant industry shift.

title: World Championship in India? UCI considers upgrading Pune Grand Tour's status next year
content: India‚Äôs first UCI 2.2 professional cycling race, the Pune Grand Tour, has impressed the sport‚Äôs global governing body, with the UCI considering an upgrade as early as next year. Praising organisation, international participation and fan response, UCI director general Amina Lanaya said Pune could become a reference race in Asia and even a future World Championships host.

title: How cool were Emmanuel Macron's sunglasses?
content: Say what you want about the French, they always know how to do things with style. Revolutions, republics, beheadings, exiles. Even their authoritarians have style. When Jean-Paul Sartre was arrested, Charles de Gaulle asked him to be released immediately, saying in a rather bathetic style: ‚ÄúOne doesn‚Äôt arrest Voltaire.‚Äù

title: Happy Republic Day 2026: Messages to share with your close ones
content: Republic Day, celebrated annually on January 26th, commemorates India's adoption of its Constitution in 1950, marking its transition to a republic. This day honors the nation's freedom, unity, and the fundamental rights and responsibilities enshrined in its Constitution. It's a time to reflect on the values that strengthen India and encourage responsible citizenship.

title: Josh Allen injury update: Bills QB faces uncertainty amid possible surgery concerns
content: Buffalo Bills General Manager Brandon Beane has provided an update about Josh Allen's injury. According to him, the star QB may undergo right-foot surgery. Furthermore, the Bills have faced a serious crisis on their offensive line. The star quarterback has injured himself in their last game against the Denver Broncos.

title: Reggie Miller says Stephen Curry should call Giannis as Father Time looms
content: Reggie Miller urged Stephen Curry to recruit Giannis Antetokounmpo to the Warriors, citing Milwaukee's struggles and the Warriors' need for star power after Jimmy Butler's injury. Miller believes this blockbuster move could save Curry's prime and reshape the league, combining two of the game's biggest stars for a championship push.

title: Ray Daniels sparks outrage with explosive LeBron‚ÄìKobe comparison
content: Music executive Ray Daniels faced widespread backlash with a controversial statement comparing LeBron James and Kobe Bryant, suggesting Bryant had a "daddy" while James did not. This personal remark, made on his podcast, shifted the debate from basketball to respect and boundaries, drawing sharp criticism from fans who deemed it unnecessary and attention-seeking.

title: Hardik Pandya surpasses Virat Kohli in T20Is, now only behind Rohit Sharma
content: Hardik Pandya has achieved a significant milestone in Indian T20I cricket. He is now the second most capped player, surpassing Virat Kohli. Pandya's consistent performance with bat and ball highlights his enduring presence in the shortest format. This achievement places him in an exclusive group of Indian cricketers with over 100 T20 international appearances.

title: Ex-Olympic snowboarder Ryan Wedding arrested after shocking fall to FBI fugitive
content: Former Olympic snowboarder Ryan Wedding has been arrested after years on the FBI‚Äôs Ten Most Wanted list. Authorities accuse Ryan Wedding of running a transnational cocaine trafficking and murder operation across multiple countries, marking a dramatic fall from representing Canada at the 2002 Winter Olympics.

title: IND vs NZ: New Zealand players wear black armbands in Raipur T20I; here's why
content: New Zealand players donned black armbands in Raipur to mourn victims of severe storms and landslides back home. Despite the somber tribute, the Black Caps posted a strong 208/6 against India in the second T20I. Earlier, India's Suryakumar Yadav won the toss and chose to bowl, making key changes to their lineup.

title: BBL: Ex-Pak cricketer asks Babar to 'swallow bitter pills' after leaving league midway
content: Former Pakistan spinner Danish Kaneria commented on Babar Azam's early exit from the Big Bash League and an on-field incident. Kaneria stated that players must accept tough situations for the team's benefit, emphasizing that such incidents are common in professional cricket and should not be taken personally.

title: 'Palaash was caught red-handed with another woman in bed,' Smriti‚Äôs friend; lawyer responds
content: Actor-producer Vidnyan Mane has made explosive allegations against singer-composer Palaash Muchhal, claiming that he cheated Indian cricketer Smriti Mandhana and also duped him of over Rs 40 lakh in connection with an unreleased film. Mane has filed a formal complaint in Sangli, Maharashtra.

title: 'Double engine won't run in Tamil Nadu': Stalin rejects PM Modi's pitch
content: Tamil Nadu CM M.K. Stalin rejected Prime Minister Narendra Modi's 'double engine' government pitch, asserting the state has achieved growth independently. Stalin accused the BJP of betraying Tamil Nadu and highlighted the growth in non-'double engine' states. Modi, in turn, criticized the DMK government as 'Corruption, Mafia, Crime' and accused them of misgovernance and vote-bank politics.

title: South Cinema‚Äôs Eventful Day: Madras HC reserves verdict on Jana Nayagan; stars reunite
content: South Cinema saw a busy January 23. The Madras High Court will decide the fate of Vijay's 'Jana Nayagan' on January 27. Mammootty and Adoor Gopalakrishnan reunite for 'Padayaatra'. Lyricist Vairamuthu was targeted at an event. Prakash Raj and Bhavana Menon met astronaut Sunita Williams. Adhik Ravichandran teased surprises for Ajith's 'AK 64'.

title: 'Very interesting': Trump on Putin's offer to pay $1bn Board of Peace fee with frozen assets
content: US President Trump reacted positively to Russian President Putin's offer to contribute $1 billion to his proposed "Board of Peace," suggesting he would accept if the funds were Putin's own. Putin indicated frozen Russian assets could be used for this, and later to rebuild Ukraine. Trump signed the charter for the body, which aims to oversee peace efforts globally.

title: Steph Curry wore Kai 3 'Chinese New Year' sneakers
content: In an incredible display of "real recognizing real," Stephen Curry debuted the unreleased ANTA KAI 3 "Chinese New Year" after personally clearing it with Kyrie Irving. The gesture, paired with a stylish tunnel walk in H√©l√† Style "Roots," highlights a legendary mutual respect even as Steph carries a staggering load for a Warriors squad depleted by Jimmy Butler‚Äôs injury.

title: T20 WC row: BCB's DRC move hits dead end; Scotland all set to replace Bangladesh
content: Bangladesh Cricket Board has appealed to the ICC's Dispute Resolution Committee regarding their T20 World Cup matches being held in India, despite the committee lacking authority over such decisions. This move follows the interim government's refusal to travel, citing security concerns. The ICC Board had previously approved India as the venue.

title: LinkedIn Job Rise 2026: Here are the jobs in Delhi that are set to take flight in 2026
content: LinkedIn‚Äôs Jobs on the Rise 2026 report shows Delhi‚Äôs job market evolving steadily rather than undergoing sudden disruption. Based on three years of hiring data, the list highlights growing demand across AI leadership, compliance, creative services, logistics, and sustainability roles, revealing a workforce balancing technological advancement with essential, operational, and cultural needs.

title: ICC considers 'strict action' against Bangladesh; Jay Shah in Dubai for final decision
content: The ICC is considering action against Bangladesh for refusing to tour India for the T20 World Cup 2026 due to security concerns. Bangladesh's request to shift matches to Sri Lanka was rejected, potentially leading to Scotland's replacement. The dispute escalated after a Bangladeshi player's IPL removal.

title: CBI escalates Noida sports city probe: Agency arrests Wiztown director
content: The tragic death of a techie has intensified the CBI's probe into Noida's Sports City project, focusing on Wiztown Planners Pvt Ltd. The investigation into alleged irregularities, including financial losses and regulatory lapses, has widened following the incident and a CAG report highlighting systemic failures.

title: Day after Bombay HC rap, Shiv Sena MLA‚Äôs son surrenders in Mahad poll violence case
content: Shiv Sena MLA Bharat Gogawale's son, Vikas, has surrendered to the Bombay High Court following a violent clash during Mahad Municipal Council elections. The court had previously criticized the state for failing to arrest Vikas and other accused, emphasizing the adverse impact on the rule of law.

title: Couple found dead in Ahmedabad flat: Congress MP‚Äôs nephew ‚Äòaccidentally‚Äô shoots wife
content: Tragedy struck in Ahmedabad as Yashrajsinh Gohil, nephew of a Rajya Sabha MP, allegedly shot his wife Rajeshwari with his licensed revolver before taking his own life. The couple, married for two months, had returned from a social event. Police are investigating the sequence of events, with initial findings suggesting accidental firing followed by suicide.

title: Ex-India cricketer calls for Shubman Gill's removal as ODI captain
content: Former India batter Manoj Tiwary advocates for Rohit Sharma's immediate return as ODI captain, citing Shubman Gill's recent struggles. Tiwary believes Rohit's proven leadership is crucial for the upcoming World Cup, suggesting a significantly higher chance of victory under his command compared to Gill's. He questioned the timing of the captaincy change.

title: Pills, pillow, porn: How Andhra woman used 'biryani' to kill husband
content: A woman in Andhra Pradesh allegedly murdered her husband with her boyfriend's assistance by drugging his biryani and then suffocating him. She later claimed he died of a heart attack, but injuries and a post-mortem confirmed suffocation. Both have been detained by police.

title: Last time Bangladesh was involved in an ICC event row, it led to a team replacement
content: Bangladesh Cricket Board has refused to send its team to the ICC T20 World Cup 2026 in India, citing a lack of justice from the ICC. The global governing body rejected Bangladesh's venue shift request and has issued an ultimatum. Scotland is now the frontrunner to replace Bangladesh in the tournament.

title: South India‚Äôs tier 2, tier 3 residential sales value crosses ‚Çπ20,000 cr. in 2025
content: Despite improvement in deliveries, permissions, e-Khata processes and power connections continue to face bureaucratic bottlenecks that push up finance costs and slow down handovers, says CREDAI

title: Kerala declares Bacillus subtilis ‚ÄòState microbe‚Äô
content: Kerala the first State in the country to officially declare its own State microbe. Chief Minister dedicates to the people Centre of Excellence in Microbiome, which will scientifically study the role of microorganisms in health and environment

title: Diversify your fish basket to woo new markets: from rohu, catla to scampi, tilapia, pangasius
content: Fisheries Ministry also pushes for cultivation of a wider variety of species to reduce the risk of disease wiping out a single species; urges States to find new markets, adopt new technologies

title: India, EU to upgrade ties at Delhi summit, but still working out trade deal
content: Deeper cooperation is expected to be announced across various dimensions, including climate change, supply chains and critical minerals, humanitarian assistance and disaster relief, as well as cooperation at multilateral forums

title: Union Home Secretary asks States to not affect any jurisdictional changes till March 31, 2027
content: He asks States to ensure timely appointment and training of Census functionaries, effective use of digital tools, and a focused publicity and communication approach

title: 71 fugitives located abroad in 2024-25, highest in 12 years
content: DoPT data shows only 27 fugitives returned to India in 2025; India has extradition treaties with 48 countries; as on March 31, 2025, there were 533 letters rogatory from India pending with other countries

title: The Hindu, VIT Chennai to organise webinar series on careers in biotechnology in industry
content: A series of webinars will explore innovations in healthcare, agriculture, environment, and advanced manufacturing, while also addressing challenges such as sustainability, resilience, and inclusive growth

title: Netaji‚Äôs strategic vision more relevant than ever in today‚Äôs unstable world: CDS General Anil Chauhan
content: Delivering an address at Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) on the birth anniversary of Netaji, General Chauhan said Bose exemplified the seamless integration of political vision, astute diplomacy and military operations

title: Top JeM terrorist killed in encounter in J&K‚Äôs Kathua
content: Officials identified the deceased terrorist as JeM commander Usman alias ‚ÄòAbu Maviya‚Äô. They said a large quantity of arms and ammunition, including an M4 automatic rifle, were recovered during the operation in a remote village in Parhetar area

title: Walkouts a departure from ‚Äòlimited freewheeling‚Äô permitted to Governors
content: Article 176 (1) mandates that Governors, at the commencement of the first session of each year, ‚Äúshall‚Äù address the Legislative Assembly

title: Maharashtra Minister Chhagan Bhujbal and kin discharged in money laundering case
content: Activist set to challenge court order, seeks response from Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis; Opposition decries the loss of credibility of institutions

title: Janardhan Reddy‚Äôs model house set on fire in Ballari
content: This act of arson comes at a time when the city remains politically charged following the violent clash earlier this month

title: Transport stakeholders divided over bike taxi services after court order
content: While bike taxi riders welcomed the High Court‚Äôs order, auto-rickshaw unions and transport associations expressed concern over safety risks and the economic impact on thousands of families dependent on traditional transport services.

title: Ambitious scheme to spur next-gen battery manufacturing in India stumbles
content: Delays in visa approvals for Chinese technical specialists, requirements that mandate local manufacturing, and the lack of critical technologies threaten the government‚Äôs Advanced Chemistry Cell Production Linked Incentive scheme, says report

title: Telangana government yet to submit formal Concept Note for Musi riverfront project: Asian Development Bank
content: Team says no definitive agreement has been reached between ADB and the State government regarding the exact scope of the project or the terms and modalities of any potential funding

title: Madras High Court directs forest department to return three elephants to Kanchi Kamakoti Peetam
content: Chief Justice Manindra Mohan Shrivastava and Justice G. Arul Murugan dismiss a writ appeal filed against Justice V. Lakshminarayanan‚Äôs order

title: Actor Vijay‚Äôs tax penalty case: Madras High Court reserves orders
content: Justice Senthilkumar Ramamoorthy defers his verdict on a writ petition filed by the actor in 2022 challenging the penalty imposed in connection with his income tax returns for the year 2015-16

title: President inaugurates Granth Kutir at Rashtrapati Bhavan
content: Granth Kutir (book house) has a rich collection of manuscripts and books in 11 classical languages of India, including Tamil, Sanskrit, Kannada, Malayalam, Odia, Marathi, Pali, Prakrit, Assamese, and Bengali

title: Capital Amaravati gears up for maiden Republic Day celebration
content: Elaborate arrangements are being made for the grand event on a 22-acre parade ground, with an exclusive VIP gallery for the Amaravati farmers

title: Assam plans ropeway linking railway station to Kamakhya Temple
content: Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma said the Centre‚Äôs proposal would add momentum to sacred journeys in the State

title: Stir against rural jobs Bill to be decentralised, widespread, says NREGA Morcha
content: The coalition of NGOs and worker unions has called on gram panchayats to move a resolution against the new legislation;¬†first round of protests to be held on Republic Day

title: Madras High Court imposes gag order against ‚ÄòSavukku‚Äô Shankar
content: Directs him not to make any statement or comment regarding the criminal cases pending against him in any forum including print, electronic and social media

title: Adoor Prakash on the defensive as more photos of him with Potti emerge
content: MP says he is the victim of a political witch hunt; Satheesan says photographs no proof of culpability in the case as projected by the LDF¬†

title: Take action against illegal Bangladesh immigrants, State govt. told
content: State president of Shiv Sena (Shinde faction) Siddalinga Swami says illegal Bangladesh immigrants are posing a serious threat to the country

title: Questions over lack of blueprint for capital and big ticket announcements during PM visit
content: CPI(M) leaders, including General Education Minister V. Sivankutty, accuse the BJP of failing to deliver on its promises and stalling Kerala‚Äôs development by withholding funds.

title: CRDA allots 115 plots to Amaravati farmers through e-lottery
content: Plots with road cuts have not been allotted and no plot is located on lands not acquired from the farmers, say officials

title: Lorry owners urge A.P. govt. to put on hold vehicle tracking device norm
content: New vehicle registrations should be allowed without insisting on installation of a VLTD until the technical and other issues related to the devices are resolved, says Andhra Pradesh Lorry Owners' Association

title: Thousands in Bengal receive SIR notices over ‚Äòunusually high number‚Äô of children linked to electors
content: West Bengal Congress president Subhankar Sarkar flags ‚Äòarbitrary‚Äô threshold setting by the Election Commission and points out that the number of electors with six or more electors linked to them as children stood at 2,06,056, whereas, if the threshold is raised to 10, the number was only 8,682

title: Fissures emerge in Twenty20 after joining BJP-led NDA alliance
content: The Congress and the CPI(M) claim disillusioned Twenty20 workers and leaders, including elected representatives, are set to defect to their ranks in the coming days. about the stability of the UDF

title: Murari Babu granted bail in Sabarimala gold theft case as SIT fails to file chargesheet
content: He becomes the first accused in the high-profile case to be released from jail; bail granted to Babu under stringent conditions; remand period of senior Tantri extended to another 14 days

title: Naidu urges banks to ensure credit support for agriculture, MSMEs
content: Chief Minister also seeks generous funding for renewable energy sector, noting that both the Centre and the State are prioritising investments, with DISCOMs providing counter-guarantees

title: K.C. Venugopal files complaint over fake social media posts
content: With Assembly elections approaching, intention behind such false propaganda is character assassination and to influence voters for political gains, he says

title: Authorities deny ‚Äòsudden stoppage‚Äô of water from KC Canal
content: Farmers need to follow the Irrigation Advisory Board guidelines, they say, adding that the advisory against taking up rabi cultivation along the 0-150 km stretch of the canal after January 15 has been communicated in advance to the farmers

title: Jana Nayagan censor row: Madras High Court to pronounce verdict on January 27
content: Chief Justice Manindra Mohan Shrivastava and Justice G. Arul Murugan would be delivering the verdict they had reserved on January 20, 2026

title: No need to oppose influencers as long as purpose of journalism is not compromised: Barkha Dutt
content: Journalist Barkha Dutt received the 2025 Chavara Media Award for her lifetime contribution to journalism, instituted by the Department of Journalism, Sacred Heart College, Thevara

title: Integrated pharmacy counter opened at Government Medical College Hospital Thiruvananthapuram
content: The facility will cater to the medicine requirement of the beneficiaries of various health insurance schemes

title: Kharge, Rahul brainstorm with Cong. leaders from Kerala on Assembly poll strategy
content: Candidate selection, seat-sharing with allies, and building bridges with social organisations reportedly topped the agenda. Sunny Joseph, Satheesan, Chennithala, Adoor Prakash, M.M. Hassan among attendees

title: BJP agenda in Kerala is purely communal: Satheesan
content: Modi had nothing to say about developmental achievements, country‚Äôs future, or State‚Äôs priorities. Instead, he made only communal remarks, says Leader of the Opposition

title: Union Minister Pemmmasani slams Jagan‚Äôs remarks on land resurvey
content: Refuting allegations of ‚Äòcredit theft‚Äô, the Union Minister says that the Centre withheld incentive funds pertaining to the exercise as the YSRCP government failed to submit required documents

title: Honest Prajwal Ritti‚Äôs photo to be displayed in schools, family to get site
content: Lakkundi Gram Panchayat has resolved to reward the boy and his family for returning treasure they found during excavation for their house

title: Pinarayi, Satheesan condemn attack on Christian pastor in Odisha
content: Referring to reports that pastor was forced to consume cow dung, Chief Minister describes act as ‚Äòdeeply inhuman.‚Äô Leader of the Opposition says incident exposes ‚Äòbrutal face‚Äô of anti-Christian hatred

title: MVD books 174 autorickshaw drivers in special drive
content: As many as 365 autorickshaws conducting services at night in the city were intercepted by six squads as part of the drive

title: 42,345 PM Awas Yojana houses to be distributed in Hubballi today
content: A host of Ministers, led by CM Siddaramaiah, Deputy Chief Minister D.K. Shivakumar, are set to participate in a State-level programme in Hubballi

title: Minister claims record water transfer from Handri-Neeva project
content: Thanks to capacity enhancements during the earlier term of the TDP and the present coalition dispensation, the project has delivered 40.109 tmc ft of water to the reservoirs and tanks across the Rayalaseema districts in 190 days, says Nimmala Ramanaidu

title: ‚ÄòBaby Girl‚Äô movie review: Nivin Pauly-Lijomol Jose starrer fails to work due to dated approach
content: With the story of a newborn‚Äôs disappearance from a hospital losing momentum by the halfway mark, the rest of the film plods along with the aid of the emotional drama and a few convenient contrivance. ¬†

title: HC directs Collector to grant permission for Pamba Boat Race on February 1
content: The directive comes in the wake of the alleged refusal of the district administration to grant permission to the Pamba Boat Race Club for a revised date to hold the race

title: CPI(M) dismisses high-profile defections as opportunism
content: CPI(M) leader Suja Chandrababu exits party to  join IUML. Earlier, Aisha Potty had defected to Congress

title: Netaji‚Äôs birth anniversary celebrated in Ballari, Vijayanagara districts
content: AIDSO calls upon students to draw inspiration from his revolutionary ideals and work towards building a just and socialist India

title: IUML re-calibrates tactics to offset emerging SNDP Yogam-NSS unity
content: Recognising that a polarisation led by these two influential community organisations can jeopardise its collective prospects, the party leadership is focussing instead on a pragmatic exchange of Assembly constituencies with UDF allies, including Congress

title: SC to examine plea on ASI ‚Äòtakeover‚Äô of Thirupparankundram temple
content: They ordered the issue of notice to the Centre, the Archaeological Survey of India, and the State of Tamil Nadu on the plea

title: RJD leaders express anger over Bihar government downgrading Tejashwi‚Äôs security cover
content: Security cover of several Opposition leaders were withdrawn whereas NDA leaders security enhanced, including new BJP president Nitin Nabin, from Y+ to Z category

title: NDA spreading lies on land survey during YSRCP term, says Perni Nani
content: The government has not issued a single new pattadar passbook, but merely reissued them after removing the photograph of the former Chief Minister, he says

title: UDF demands public apology from Ganesh Kumar for ‚Äòdisparaging‚Äô Oommen Chandy
content: Congress leader Chandy Oomen appeared to open old wounds last week when he told a UDF meeting at Ganesh Kumar‚Äôs constituency in Pathanapuram that the Minister had wronged his father in the solar scam case

title: Odisha Girl, 10, First Raped By Man, Then By Minor Boy. Mother Intervenes
content: A 10-year-old girl was raped by a 22-year-old man and a minor boy in Odisha's Nayagarh district on Thursday.

title: Woman Locks Lover In Chest For 45 Minutes To Hide Him, He Comes Out Gasping
content: They say love is blind. But in Uttar Pradesh's Kanpur, love almost cost the life of a young man who came to his girlfriend's place just seven houses away from where he lives.

title: Trump Accuses NATO Of Avoiding Afghanistan Frontline, UK PM Demands Apology
content: US President Donald Trump claimed that NATO troops "stayed a little back" from the frontlines in Afghanistan. He questioned whether NATO would "be there" if the United States "ever needed them."

title: 3-Year-Old, Missing For 10 Days, Found Dead In Drain In Delhi: Cops
content: The body of a three-year-old boy, who had gone missing from his home in southeast Delhi earlier this month, was recovered from a drain near his residence in the Jaitpur area on Friday, police said.

title: Trump Mocks Global Warming As Ice Storm Looms Over Two-Thirds Of US
content: Donald Trump took a dig at global warming fears amid forecasts of a winter storm for two-thirds of America. Taking to Truth Social, Trump questioned the reality of global warming in the wake of 40 US states being expected to be hit by a cold wave.

title: 4 Killed As Bus Collides With Tourist Vehicle In Karnataka: Police
content: Four people were killed following a head-on collision between a bus and a tourist vehicle in the district on Friday, police said.

title: EU, India To Sign Landmark Security Pact Amid Push For Free Trade Deal
content: In a significant move to bolster ties between two of the world's largest democracies, the European Union (EU) and India are set to unveil a "Security and Defence Strategic Partnership" and are closing in on a landmark Free Trade Agreement.

title: "When States Compete, India Wins": Andhra Minister Nara Lokesh To NDTV
content: Showcasing Andhra Pradesh's success under the Chandrababu Naidu government, IT minister Nara Lokesh has said 25% of all investments in India are flowing to the state, and underlined that this is just the beginning.

title: 560 Roads Blocked, 4,800 Transformers Disrupted: Snowfall Lash Himachal
content: Widespread snowfall and rainfall across Himachal Pradesh have severely disrupted public utilities, with more than 560 roads blocked and nearly 4,800 electricity distribution transformers (DTRs) affected, the State Disaster Management Authority said.

title: Hindus Perform Puja, Muslims Offer Namaz In Madhya Pradesh's Bhojshala
content: Amid tight security, thousands of Hindus performed puja to mark Basant Panchami and a handful of Muslim devotes offered namaz at separate locations within the disputed Bhojshala-Kamal Maula Mosque complex in Madhya Pradesh's Dhar district on Friday.

title: Indian Armed Forces To Display Operation Sindoor Tableau On Republic Day
content: Indian Armed Forces will showcase a tableau on Operation Sindoor with a motto of "Victory through jointness", highlighting India's success and the coordination of the tri-services in the military operation against Pakistan's terror infrastructure.

title: Danish PM To Meet Greenland Counterpart After Trump's Latest Comments
content: Danish Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen will on Friday hold talks with her Greenlandic counterpart after a turbulent week that saw US President Donald Trump back down from his threats to seize the Arctic island and agree to talks.

title: Russia Demands Ukraine Pull Out Of Donbas Region Ahead Of Abu Dhabi Talks
content: Russia said it was not dropping its key demand that Ukraine pull out of its eastern Donbas region, ahead of three-way talks between Ukrainian, Russian and American officials in the UAE later on Friday.

title: "Donbas Is Key": Zelensky On Territorial Discussions At Trilateral Talks
content: President Volodymyr Zelensky said on Friday that the vital question of territory in Ukraine's war with Russia would be discussed at US-brokered trilateral talks in Abu Dhabi on Friday and Saturday.

title: 'Middle Class Taxed For Surviving, Not Thriving': Expert Urges Fix In Budget 2026
content: Singla proposes a percentage-based standard deduction. "It would restore fairness by aligning taxation with economic reality."

title: On Camera, 2 Die As Speeding Bike Veers, Rams Highway Railing In Telangana
content: Two people died on the spot after their speeding motorcycle crashed into a roadside railing on the Greenfield National Highway. The accident took place in Lingala village of Kallur mandal in Telangana's Khammam district.

title: High Ammonia Levels In Yamuna To Disrupt Water Supply In Delhi Till Feb 4
content: High ammonia levels in the Yamuna and reduced water supply from Haryana through the Munak Canal are set to cause significant disruption in water supply in parts of Delhi until February 4.

title: "DMK Being Called CMC Government - Corruption, Mafia, Crime": PM Modi
content: Setting the stage for a high-stakes battle for the Tamil Nadu Assembly election, Prime Minister Narendra Modi addressed a large gathering at Maduranthakam near Chennai and declared that the countdown for the DMK's exit has begun.

title: Bail Should Not Be Linked To Monetary Deposits Or Undertakings: Top Court
content: In a significant ruling on bail jurisprudence, the Supreme Court has observed that courts should not insist on upfront monetary deposits or undertakings as a precondition for the grant or consideration of bail.

title: Ujjain: Tensions erupt after clashes between two groups; bus torched, shops damaged
content: clashes between two groups erupted a day earlier in the town of Tarana . the situation escalated when unknown elements allegedly pelted stones at houses . miscreants also targeted a bus, which was set on fire, while some shops were damaged .

title: How street-fighter Mamata is using Cong's vote chori & SIR ammo better than Rahul
content: Mamata is not new when it comes to aggressive brand of politics . she has mobilised the entire party cadre to fight the changes in the voter list . the protest was directed against the left Front government led by Jyoti Basu .

title: Expert picks: 'The Highlight' is a bad matchup for 'The Baddy'
content: a matchup between lightweight fan favorites will headline the first fight card since Dec. 13 . paddy Pimblett, ESPN's no. 7-ranked lightweight, is undefeated in the UFC . his last win was a third-round knockout of Michael Chandler .

title: Rose-themed concession items planned for Derrick Rose's jersey retirement
content: the "Rose Cocktail" is a clarified margarita with reposado tequila . the drink includes a rose-infused ice cube with a red rose inside . there's an MVP burger and fries plus no. 1 nachos .

title: Who should've made the top 10? What were the biggest surprises?
content: the college football top 100 player rank list from the 2025-26 season is here . the real question is, did our selection committee get it right? were there any players who should've made the list but didn't?

title: Who wins the 2026 national title? We predict the CFP bracket
content: a 12-team playoff has turned out to be a lot of fun, but we stick with 12 for a while longer . if we simply used Schlabach's rankings for this exercise, we'd be looking at a field resembling this . it's time for the next step in the predictions process: let's talk about who will make the college football playoff .

title: KD, rising guards and bully ball: Inside the Rockets' Texas-sized offense
content: the Houston Rockets lost 20-point to the defending champions . they would close out the worst seven-game stretch of 3-point shooting in history . not even 24-year-olds were shot in the first half of the game .

title: 8 years, 5 schools and a career-threatening condition: The story of Tyon Grant-Foster
content: Tyon Grant-Foster won a game-saving block on the perimeter to force overtime . the 6-foot-7 forward helped the Bulldogs claw back in the second half . he will have suited up for five different schools by the time he turns 26 in march .

title: NLL Week 9 preview: Critical weekend for eight teams
content: the Saskatchewan Rush are atop the standings after the first eight weeks, at 6-1 . the Colorado Mammoth and Rochester Knighthawks are both 4-2 . all games this season can be seen on the ESPN App and in the NLL streaming hub .

title: 'Great trip to Davos': Trump boasts but gets cold reception back home
content: formally rescinded the invitation to Ottawa . the invitation deepens the chill between the two neighbors . a former governor of the bank of Canada and the Bank of England warns of 'transactional alliances' .
